text:
Dishcraft Robotics | San Carlos CA | Multiple Positions | Onsite

At Dishcraft Robotics, our mission is to build things that matter. We are a venture-backed Bay Area start-up that is revolutionizing robotics, computer vision, machine learning, and innovative mechanical design.

First and foremost, at Dishcraft Robotics we value people, intellectual engagement, and transparent communication. We are looking for highly motivated, intellectually curious and passionate business people and technologists to bring our robots to life. Come join our talented team as we create advanced machines in an industry that touches everyone.

Deep Learning Engineer

Electro-Mechanical Engineer

Full-Stack Software Engineer

Manufacturing Engineer

Mechanical Engineer

Software Engineer-Robotics

More details at http://www.dishcraft.com/jobs/
